# clearpass_role (Resource)

Manages a user role in ClearPass.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The unique name of the role (e.g., 'Guest' or '[Employee]').

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the role.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Numeric ID of the role. This is used as the Terraform ID.
